001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.*;
004
005/**
006 * Marks a class or type as using the <b>Composition</b> design pattern.
007 * <p>
008 * Composition is a structural design pattern that builds complex objects
009 * by combining or "composing" simpler objects.
010 */
011@Documented
012@DesignPattern(DesignPattern.Category.STRUCTURAL)
013@Retention(RetentionPolicy.SOURCE)
014@Target(ElementType.TYPE)
015public @interface Composition {
016}
